about_the_game:
The Music for Comic Top Secret was created by Bjørn Svin
Bjørn is a composer and performer of rhythmical electronic music, who creates "a self-contained universe of rhythmical sound and harmonies".
His music aims to make the actual articulation of his sounds, a substantial part of the expression.

Songs (mp3) will be placed in your Cosmic Top Secret folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\CosmicTopSecret\Soundtrack

1. Agent T (04:18)
2. Underverdenen (03:09)
3. Buzzhards (02:09)
4. T rings (03:41)
5. bowbrow (03:22)
6. Fortification (05:49)
7. Mer strøm #0 (Reprise) (02:11)
8. air engine (10:54)
9. Inverted Matrix (16:39
10. Bugswings (06:07)
11. r00n (03:34)
12. Huler (01:49)
13. T take off (05:15)
14. Inverted Glasses (07:43)
15. Previous Coordinator (06:01)
16. Redowls (25:17)
